titleStmt.title: A treatise, shewing the possibilitie, and conueniencie of the reall presence of our Sauiour in the blessed Sacrament the former is declared by similitudes and examples: the latter by the causes of the same.
titleStmt.author: Wright, Thomas, d. 1624.

titleStmt.title: A treatise, shewing the possibilitie, and conueniencie of the reall presence of our Sauiour in the blessed Sacrament the former is declared by similitudes and examples: the latter by the causes of the same.
titleStmt.author: Wright, Thomas, d. 1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Ioachim Trognesius [i.e. Valentine Simmes],

notesStmt.note: The imprint is false; in fact printed in London by Valentine Simmes (STC).
Running title reads: The treatise of the blessed Sacrament.
Identified as STC 14574 on UMI microfilm reel 471, and as STC 24249 on reel 1119.
Reproductions of the original in the Bodleian Library.
Appears at reel 471 and at reel 1119 (same copy filmed twice).
